column5: I'm looking for a lake map for Canyon Lake near Vermillion Bay. Cabin fever is setting in and I want to mark some spots to try when we go there this summer. Anyone know where i can get one? I've tried the MNR website and they don't have one.
Try "Northern Sporting Goods" out of Red Lake, Ontario. Over the years I've had good luck with them getting me maps. 807-727-2302 Good luck, Pooch
